name: Tappy Toys
description:
Welcome to Tappy Toys, 

This is a tappy bird clone that I've done. It's one of the first game that I built.
I plan to add some functionality and features as I learn Unity. I will also be creating other games. 
If you have any suggestions or feedback, please feel free to drop me a line.

If you have other game ideas, but aren't a programmer, hit me up, maybe we can collaborate!

Cheers and enjoy!
